item.description:
Hi everyone!

Brad & I will be back from our travels in October and are excited to get back into the meetup group! Since Happy Hour's always seem to be a hit, we thought we could do another one.

Jillian's is right by Fenway, and since we will have a large group it will be a great spot. We will officially start at 7:30, but as always feel free to come when you please! Brad & I will be there around 7:00.

Hope to see you there,
Corinne & Brad
item.how_to_find_us: We will be on the 2nd floor near the pool tables,
item.name: October Happy Hour!
